messages: 3a49075f84d9ac87c3619e2afe7d25e8 (13:37): have you heard of VNC/KVM?
3a49075f84d9ac87c3619e2afe7d25e8 (13:38): VNC = virtual network computing, a term for things that let you use another computer as your own, kinda like what X11 does only for possibly non-X11 things
42192e9b6adc8a45c267e6bfffeb4706 (13:39): i'm doing VNC right now. but what is VNC/KVM?
3a49075f84d9ac87c3619e2afe7d25e8 (13:39): KVM = keyboard-video-mouse, not terribly descriptive, but it usually describes a switch that lets you use one KVM for multiple computers
3a49075f84d9ac87c3619e2afe7d25e8 (13:40): one software KVM you might be interested in is Synergy, i hear it even syncronizes clipboards between 2 comps
42192e9b6adc8a45c267e6bfffeb4706 (13:40): i'll check it out
42192e9b6adc8a45c267e6bfffeb4706 (13:40): keep in mind that my main machine is OS X
3a49075f84d9ac87c3619e2afe7d25e8 (13:41): Synergy works on Win, MacOSX, and linux
3a49075f84d9ac87c3619e2afe7d25e8 (13:41): i'm on macosx too
42192e9b6adc8a45c267e6bfffeb4706 (13:41): ah, i see. i'm looking at sourceforge page right now
9529deb1595649895f46599df6484ebe (13:41): Anyone has ever used the export to 3ds?
9529deb1595649895f46599df6484ebe (13:41): i can't open any file

3a49075f84d9ac87c3619e2afe7d25e8 (13:43): you're welcome :)
